text:
Thank you very much <@U01QVR44MEY>, you are always helpful.
The problem though is that I don't understand why I have to do something custom when page 0 is really useless. Especially since it could be indexed.
Oh honestly I'm not entirely sure, that's something you would have to ask the blog team
<@U6W3H6YN8> maybe you know the best person to reach out to on the blog team?
